body_html: You are right, @klappradla! My screen resolution is 1366 x 768, but since I have a lateral menu on ubuntu, the browser resolution is smaller and the badge is hidden. On my windows partition, the browser opens full length and I can see the badge! That's why I was confused and thought it was a ubuntu specific problem! 🤣
body_text: You are right, @klappradla! My screen resolution is 1366 x 768, but since I have a lateral menu on ubuntu, the browser resolution is smaller and the badge is hidden. On my windows partition, the browser opens full length and I can see the badge! That's why I was confused and thought it was a ubuntu specific problem! 🤣
body: You are right, @klappradla! My screen resolution is 1366 x 768, but since I have a lateral menu on ubuntu, the browser resolution is smaller and the badge is hidden. On my windows partition, the browser opens full length and I can see the badge! That's why I was confused and thought it was a ubuntu specific problem! :rofl:
